Title: The Dirty Dancing Dance
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Adam F. Goldberg (teleplay), Adam F. Goldberg (story), David Guarascio (story), Lacey Marisa Friedman (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Beverly helps Erica plan a school dance with a "Dirty Dancing" theme, but turns on her daughter once she realizes it may be inappropriate. Meanwhile, Murray and Adam try to become better dancers, without much luck.
